content.prompt: If wages are sticky, which of the following is true?

choices.label: The short-run aggregate supply curve is vertical.
The short-run aggregate supply curve is upward sloping.
The long-run aggregate supply curve is downward sloping.
The aggregate demand curve is vertical.
The aggregate demand curve is upward sloping.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
